justification: Proposal centers on Team A’s needs and ignores Team B’s preferences for reliable, workhorse RBs and consistent possession WRs. Team B actively buys injured players, making trading away a Q-tag RB less likely. B already has strong TE depth, so Austin Allen isn’t enticing, and Marcus Taylor (Tier 5, high variance) doesn’t fit B’s consistency bias. Trade is feasible but misaligned and even undercuts A by moving their best TE. Rationale is minimal and not B-focused.
